about_the_game:
This is an alpha demo.

This means it's not final and some parts require further polish, but gives a taste of what the game is like to play, so you can choose whether or not to wishlist it.
It's a simple concept, get the key, go through the door.
It's a 2d action puzzle game, it's a combination of working out how to do certain areas while at the same time avoid being reset by the enemies.
The demo has infinite lives and saves progress.
detailed_description:
This is an alpha demo.

This means it's not final and some parts require further polish, but gives a taste of what the game is like to play, so you can choose whether or not to wishlist it.
It's a simple concept, get the key, go through the door.
It's a 2d action puzzle game, it's a combination of working out how to do certain areas while at the same time avoid being reset by the enemies.
The demo has infinite lives and saves progress.

name: Feline Sweet Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: AMD A6-6410
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R5 mobile.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most should work fine.
  • Additional Notes: Old test machine is a 2014ish laptop. Windows 7 is untested but may work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A6-6410 Anything better than this should be good.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R5 mobile, anything past this is probably more than enough.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most should work just fine.
  • Additional Notes: Try this demo as game is arcadey and not to everyone's taste.

short_description: An action 2d puzzle game, demo has 10 playable levels. It's also early alpha so not everything is polished up. I'd prefer you try the game out, both for compat reasons, and to see if the game is your type of gameplay, before considering purchasing.
